welcome_message_body: Welcome to Streetly, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful parks and peaceful atmosphere, we invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving charter and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 4 hours within a 24-hour period.
